contact.title: Leave us a message
contact.confirmation_message: The form has been submitted successfully! Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.address: C/ Avinguda de les Garrigues 34. 25001, Lleida, Spain.
contact.support_text: Share your questions with our support team and we will respond quickly so you can continue with your project.

error.error_message: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

contratar-servicio.titulo: You are about to hire a service!
contratar-servicio.descripcion2: Please complete the following fields to submit your service request.
contratar-servicio.confirmacion: Your request has been successfully sent! You will receive a response from the service provider shortly.
contratar-servicio.descripcion: Remember to explain in as much detail as possible the problem you are facing so that the service provider can clearly understand what you are experiencing. This will make it easier for both of you.
contratar-servicio.fecha: Choose the date on which you would like the service to be performed. This will only be a preliminary reference.
contratar-servicio.errorFecha: The date must be between today and one year from today.
contratar-servicio.ejemplo: E.g.: Deep cleaning of the computer and thermal paste replacement at home

home.title1: These are the highest-rated services by our community

home.create_service_description: Be part of our community and start creating your own service!
home.evidence_title: The evidence is more than clear!
home.testimonial1_text: Roger is a great professional, he is a very attentive and understanding person. He is very hardworking and fulfills everything he promises in his service. A highly recommended professional.
